values: 标准；规范；准则；规格；尺度；行为标准；典范；道德水准；（被保持垂直或挺立的）支柱；流行曲调；标准语；度量衡；参照物；正常水平；植货币本位；（仪式上使用的）旗帜；（军队的）军旗
标准的；符合标准的；规范的；权威的；权威性的；经典的；常规的；通常的；普通的；正常的；一般性的；合乎规范的；按一定规格制作的

synonym.mean: 标准；水准；旗；度量衡标准
标准的；合规格的；公认为优秀的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 坚硬的, 艰苦的, 努力的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 标准的；标准化的；定型的
使合乎标准；按标准校准；制定标准（standardize的过去分词）
标准化；[数] 规格化；校准
使…符合标准；使…标准化；使…统一

word_mean_info__list.difference: 较正式用词，指判断、批评事物的标准，但不一定制成了规章。
与standard基本同义，但多用于比喻，指衡量某事物的质量准则。
指公认为决定事物质量或人的品质的准则或原则。
专指测量物体大小、厚度、直径等的标准规格。

word_group.brief_definition: 金本位制；同类中最好（或最有声望的）东西

bilingual.source: Standard English is the form of English used in writing.
bilingual.target: 标准英语是书面使用的英语形式。

bilingual.source: Non-standard English is often used in more informal situations.
bilingual.target: 非标准英语通常用于更非正式的场合。
我们预订了一间标准房。
这些标准件符合国际质量标准。
我们应该设定一个新的标准。

bilingual.source: Please set the camera to standard mode.
bilingual.target: 请将相机设置为标准模式。

bilingual.source: His income is below the national standard.
bilingual.target: 他的收入低于国家标准。
这个产品符合国际标准。

bilingual.source: The carbine is lighter than a standard rifle.
We need to follow the company's standard.
bilingual.target: 我们需要遵守公司的标准。

list.abstract: standard是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和形容词，可以翻译为标准、规格，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: By that standard, Penny is cuckoo for Cocoa Puffs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 根据这个标准，佩妮病得不轻。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, I'm behavioral economics. And I'm standard economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我是行为经济学。我是标准经济学。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the standard story.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是标准的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: You are holding yourself to an unreasonable standard. No, I'm failing to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在用过高的标准要求自己。不，我没达到那个标准。

yingyinNormal.en: He was set up like a standard Replicant, put on a service job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他以为自己是一个标准的复制人，成为了一名警察。

yingyinNormal.en: You're an hour late to every meeting. We have a name for it. Jules standard time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你每一次开会都会晚一个小时，我们叫它朱尔斯标准时间。

yingyinNormal.en: So... All righty, FrontPoint Partners, how can Standard & Poor's help you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么好的，顶尖基金公司的朋友们，标准普尔有什么能帮到你们吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to make sure that we're all clear. Standard robotic fighting league rules apply.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是想确认下我们说好了，按照标准机器人格斗联盟规则。

yingyinNormal.en: Mike, he's a policeman. Yeah? Not exactly standard police issue. Really? Oh, my god.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克，他是个警察。是吗？这可不是警察的标准配备，信了吧？我的天。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then that is proof of a double-standard mentality that we shall no longer tolerate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就证明他们抱有一种双重标准的心态，而我们将不再容忍这种心态。

yingyinNormal.en: Tonight is Thai food. You'll find the standard order in appendix B or downloadable from my FTP server.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚是泰国菜，标准点菜订单在附录B，或可从我的FTP下载。

yingyinNormal.en: The standard "I told you so"? The classic "Neener neener"? Or just my normal look of haughty derision?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是标准答案，我早说过会这样，还是经典的“哦也哦也”，还是用我平常那副高傲嘲弄的表情？

yingyinNormal.en: The silver lining in all of these is that in standard economics there's nothing we can do to better the human condition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这当中我们仍存有一丝希望，在标准经济学中，人性已经没有可以提升的空间。

yingyinNormal.en: One of the last gens, pre-Prohibition. Standard issue. Made by Tyrell. And? Unremarkable. "Unremarkable"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 信息显示他是禁令之前的最后一代复制人。标准型号的。泰勒公司产品。还有么？没什么特别的了。没了？

yingyinNormal.en: What time does the trial period end? 12:00, noon. Yeah, what does it say after that? Eastern Standard Time. That was three hours ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试用期几点结束？中午12点。那后面还写了啥？东部标准时间。剧中主角所在的西部比东部慢三小时。那是3小时前的事了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, she's still pulling a commanding lead. Did Bernadette even try to send us a sewing kit? She did. Amazon, standard shipping, not even Prime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 排行榜伴娘伴郎那她也是遥遥领先呀。博纳黛特有给我们送来针线包吗？送了。亚马逊，标准配送，连金牌配送都不是。

yingyinNormal.en: But my model is so much cleaner, I have formulas and algorithms and χ-square and standard deviation. What do you have?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我的模型更为清晰，我推导出了公式，算法，还有卡方检验和标准差，你有什么?

yingyinNormal.en: I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I just need to ask you a few standard questions. Sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很感谢你对我的公寓感兴趣，我需要循例问几个问题。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Lost? Is your sat navi broken? sat navi? You are driving a camper van T3200, set navi comes a standard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 迷路？卫星导航坏掉了？卫星导航？你们开的这辆车，是T3200露营车，卫星导航是基本配备。

yingyinNormal.en: Your weapon scores are excellent, by the way. These you're familiar with. And this is our standard issue pistol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 顺便说下，你武器测试分数非常好。这些你已经很熟悉了。这是我们常规任务的配备手枪。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 标准; 水平; 规格
标准的; 普通的; 常规的
直立物; 直立茎干上的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 使标准化；（standardize的过去式）
v. 使合标准；使标准化；定出标准；立下标准；确定…的性能；确定…的特性

word_family.mean: n. 标准；水平；尺度；榜样；被保持垂直或挺立的物体；流行曲调；规范；标准语

sense_info_list.en: a level of quality, especially one that people think is acceptable
sense_info_list.zh: 标准; 水平; 规格

examination_example.sentence: Rather officials must avoid double <highlight>standards</highlight>, or different types of access for average people and the wealthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，官员们必须避免双重标准，或者普通人和富人的不同准入。

examination_example.sentence: Even better would be to help elevate notions of beauty beyond the material <highlight>standards</highlight> of a particular industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更好的办法是超越特定行业的物质标准来帮助提升美的概念。

examination_example.sentence: While such numerical <highlight>standards</highlight> seem straightforward, they are not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这样的数字标准看起来很简单，但事实并非如此。

sense_info_list.en: average or normal rather than having special or unusual features;
sense_info_list.zh: 标准的; 普通的; 常规的

examination_example.sentence: Pick a <highlight>standard</highlight> work uniform or a few go-to options.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择一套标准的工作服或有专业知识的选择。

sense_info_list.en: principles of conduct informed by notions of honor and decency
a flag that is used during official ceremonies, especially one connected with a particular military group
sense_info_list.zh: 直立物; 直立茎干上的

sense_info_list.en: believed to be correct and used by most people; read by most people who are studying a particular subject
a song that has been recorded by many different singers

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 坚硬的, 艰苦的, 努力的

exam_freq_info.chinese: 标准的; 普通的; 水平; 标准

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 金本位制；同类中最好(或最有声望的)东西

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 使标准化；（standardize的过去式）
n. 标准化；标定；规格化；规范化
v. 使合标准；使标准化；定出标准；立下标准；确定…的性能；确定…的特性

word_family.mean: n. 标准；水平；尺度；榜样；被保持垂直或挺立的物体；流行曲调；规范；标准语

sense_info_list.en:
average or normal rather than having special or unusual features;
a level of quality, especially one that people think is acceptable
sense_info_list.zh: 标准的; 普通的; 水平; 标准

examination_example.sentence: Elevate its tourism to international <highlight>standards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把旅游业提升到国际水平。

examination_example.sentence: It is the <highlight>standard</highlight> by which we measure our distances.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是我们测量距离的标准。

examination_example.sentence: That the UK lags behind is due to our weak, by international <highlight>standards</highlight>, local government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 按照国际标准，英国落后是因为我们的地方政府软弱无力。

examination_example.sentence: In the last few decades of the 20th century, living <highlight>standards</highlight> went up and economic depressions were largely averted in the US.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在20世纪的最后几十年，生活水平上升，美国很大程度上避免了经济萧条。

sense_info_list.en: principles of conduct informed by notions of honor and decency

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 坚硬的, 艰苦的, 努力的

word_usage.usage:
“...的标准”用standard for/of sth.表达。
示例：Who sets the standard for water quality?
水质标准由谁来制订？

standard表“标准”，为可数名词，多以复数形式出现。
示例：The equipment is very slow by modern standards.
按现代标准，那台设备很慢。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 标准的; 普通的; 水平; 标准
(符合)标准的; 按一定规格制作的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 标准化；标定；规格化；规范化
v. 使合标准；使标准化；定出标准；立下标准；确定…的性能；确定…的特性

word_family.mean: n. 标准；水平；尺度；榜样；被保持垂直或挺立的物体；流行曲调；规范；标准语

sense_info_list.en:
average or normal rather than having special or unusual features; 
a level of quality; especially one that people think is acceptable
sense_info_list.zh: 标准的; 普通的; 水平; 标准

examination_example.sentence: They must follow some common <highlight>standards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们必须遵循一些共识。

examination_example.sentence: Among common kitchen appliances used for cooking, microwaves are the most energy efficient, followed by a stove and finally a <highlight>standard</highlight> oven.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在所有常见的厨房烹饪用具中，微波炉是最节能的，其次是厨灶，最后是标准烤箱。

examination_example.sentence: You know the <highlight>standard</highlight> explanations: keeping a moderate diet, engaging in regular exercise, etc.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你知道标准的解释：保持适度的饮食，有规律的锻炼等等。

sense_info_list.en: following a particular standard set; for example; by an industry
sense_info_list.zh: (符合)标准的; 按一定规格制作的

examination_example.sentence: But anybody who worked for Thomas Kahoon had to meet his <highlight>standards</highlight>, and that included me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是任何为Thomas Kahoon工作的人都必须达到他的标准，我也一样。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Standard</highlight> American Diet is still the polar opposite of the healthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 标准的美国饮食仍然是健康饮食的极端对立面。

sense_info_list.en: principles of conduct informed by notions of honor and decency

word_usage.usage:

示例：Who sets the standard for water quality?
水质标准由谁来制订？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: average or normal rather than having special or unusual features; a level of quality, especially one that people think is acceptable

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>standard</highlight> method of conducting hypnosis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进行催眠的标准方法。

examination_example.sentence: Each year, the high <highlight>standard</highlight> of entries has shown that the Awards are the perfect platform.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每一年，高水准的参赛作品都表明，金像奖是完美的平台。

examination_example.sentence: The Transition is now going through crash tests to make sure it meets federal safety <highlight>standards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前“过渡号”汽车正在进行碰撞测试，以确保它符合联邦安全标准。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a level of quality, especially one that people think is acceptable
sense_info_list.zh: 标准; 水平; 规格

examination_example.sentence: According to the report, activity <highlight>standards</highlight> are different in different countries and they are also different between boys and girls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据报告，不同国家的活动标准是不一样的，并且男孩和女孩的活动标准也不一样。

examination_example.sentence: Their products weren't up to <highlight>standard</highlight> (没达到标准).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的产品没达到标准.

examination_example.sentence: In 2016, only one-fourth of Chinese cities met the country's air quality <highlight>standards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2016年，中国只有四分之一的城市达到国家空气质量标准。

sense_info_list.en: average or normal rather than having special or unusual features;
sense_info_list.zh: 标准的; 普通的; 常规的

examination_example.sentence: Emily gives <highlight>standard</highlight> answers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾米丽给出了标准答案。

examination_example.sentence: My answers are pretty <highlight>standard</highlight> as well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的回答也很标准。

examination_example.sentence: Included in <highlight>standard</highlight> prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括在标准价格中。

示例：Who sets the standard for water quality?

示例：The equipment is very slow by modern standards.
